name: 4-count Burpees
how_to_perform:
### Step 1: Start Position
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms at your sides. Engage your core and maintain a straight posture.

### Step 2: Squat Down
Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position. Keep your back straight and lower your hands to the floor in front of you, just inside your feet.

### Step 3: Plank Position
Jump your feet back behind you so that your legs are extended and you're in a plank position. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels, engaging your core and buttocks.

### Step 4: Return to Squat
Jump your feet forward to return to the squat position with your hands on the ground.

### Step 5: Return to Stand
Explode upwards, jumping into the air from your squat position. As you jump, reach your hands above your head. Land gently and return to the starting position.
short_summary: 4-count Burpees are a full-body exercise that builds strength and endurance by incorporating a squat, plank, and jump in a four-step sequence.
